The associated balance's counting number (receipt number) of this transaction
The branch number (to be branch_custom_id)
The register number (to be register_custom_id)
The transactions unique identifier built on the client: transaction_type(%04lu) + register(%04lu) + branch(%04lu) + yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS
The staff custom id of the responsible cashier
Is not used at all
Not yet used, layout missing
The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this transaction.

The total amount of change given back -> change = Sum(payment_amounts) - total

Is not used
Is not used
Custom id of the customer if there is one
Not used

Plaintext for the receipt handed to the customer
Plaintext for the receipt kept by the merchant (e.g. for card payments, tips etc.)
Application specific barcode to retreive transactions by scanning (prefix 'RT')
Readable short description of a customer, usually their names
Is not used

oneOf.description: Geospatial data of this transaction
Quantity of the product in that item, supports floating point for e.g. 2.73 kg. The POS sends it currently as string.
Apparently not used
Apparently not used
The per qty=1 raw price of the product in the lowest (available) fraction of that currency -> 7.99 EUR or 799 HUF respectively
The per qty=1 (disocunted) price of the product in the lowest (available) fraction of that currency -> 6.12 EUR or 612 HUF respectively
The total (disocunted) revenue of the item, before or after taxes depending on the scheme, 16.71 EUR or 1671 HUF respectively
Custom identifier for the revenue financial account of the contained product
Rate of the VAT encoded in Millis 1900 = 0.19 = 19%

vat_fa_account_number.description: Custom identifier for the VAT financial account

oneOf.description: The total amount of VAT on the item, 2.67 EUR or 267 HUF respectively
Custom identifier for a staff that is the salesperson of that item
Custom identifier for the product
Apparently not used
Numerical exact amount of the VAT before rounding, no HUF shift: 266.798319327731092 EUR == 266.798319327731092 HUF !!! This value is sent as string from the POS.
Discount amount (per qty 1) = article_price - selling_price, 1.87 EUR or 187 HUF respectively
Display name of the contained product
Apparently not used
Custom identifier for the product's product group
Apparently not used
If true, the item was created by (partially) refunding a previous sale. The POS sends 0 for false and 1 for true.
UUID hack for already existing integer
In cases of refund or cancellation, or invoicing a delivery note or selling a saved cart: the custom id (counting number) of the origin transaction
In cases of refund or cancellation, or invoicing a delivery note or selling a saved cart: the creation date of the origin transaction
In cases of refund or cancellation, or invoicing a delivery note or selling a saved cart: the type of the origin transaction
Id of the Tillhub product resource
A short description of the child attributes in variant products
If true, this item represents a pseudo product compensating a tip
If true and is_tip == true, the salesperson is the shop owner (different taxation)
In cases of refund or cancellation, or invoicing a delivery note or selling a saved cart: the client_id of the origin item
If true, this item represents a service and might come with answers to service questions
The barcode used to trigger putting this item into the cart (defaults to the first available barcode from the product)
If true, this item represents a voucher and must come with voucher information in 'context'

name.description: The name of an applied discount

group.description: The group type of discount (type was taken)

order_index.description: Position of that discount inside the list (application used to have unordered set previously)

type.description: The type of the discount, decides the meaning of amount (absolut or relative value)

value.description: Source discount info, depending on type this means for 'percentage': 25% and for 'value': 0.25 EUR or 25 HUF respectively

amount.description: The per qty=1 effective discount amount -> 0.43 EUR or 43 HUF respectively

amount_total.description: The total effective discount amount -> 3.12 EUR or 312 HUF respectively

source_id.description: The Tillhub discount resource identifier for the discount used

oneOf.description: A list of applied discounts

The quantity of this item.

oneOf.description: A list of answers to product service questions

items.description: Answer to a product service question

id.description: A Tillhub product question resource identifier.

question.description: The associated Tillhub product question 'content' field.

type.description: The required layout type of the answer

content_type.description: The required content type of the answer

required.description: If true, the answer is mandatory

answer.description: The answer content of a product service question

oneOf.description: If 'number_input_plus_optional_unit_select', this field contains the inputted numerical value.
If 'checkbox', this field contains the selcetd boolean value.
If 'free_text_input' or 'simple_select', this field contains the inputted text.
If 'number_input_plus_optional_unit_select', this field contains the selected unit.

oneOf.example: Did this sale. Went to the next one.
oneOf.description: Any arbitrary comment.
Any identifier a user wants to store in the transaction system. E.g. an ID in a thirdy party ERP.
The payable net amount on the units qty base of 1, after decrementing applicable discounts etc. This value needs to be lower than or equal to the respective unti amount.
The payable gross amount on the units qty base of 1, after decrementing applicable discounts etc.  This value needs to be lower than or equal to the respective unti amount.
The payable net amount total, after decrementing applicable discounts etc. This value needs to be lower than or equal to the respective unti amount.
The payable net amount total, after decrementing applicable discounts etc. This value needs to be lower than or equal to the respective unti amount.
The original qty base 1 item net amount, e.g. the product shelf price
The original qty base 1 item net amount, e.g. the product shelf price
Custom identifier for the payment financial account
The given amount via this payment, 20.00 EUR or 2000 HUF respectively
The payment's currency
The Tillhub account resource associated with this payment option
String encoded number, not used
Name of the used payment option
Payment option type
The Tillhub payment option resource used for this payment
Not used
Date when this payment was created
The given tip via this payment, 1.10 EUR or 110 HUF respectively
The final RAW response from any kind of card terminal API (e.g. OPI, Concardis...) - Used for payment verification against card operators
A implementer defined identifier. This can be used for local resource matching and has no business implication.
Any additional flat values.
Any arbitrary title.
Account face values.

terminal.description: If a terminal was used for this payment - addtional information will be stored here. NULL together with a card type indicates a disconnected terminal payment.

oneOf.description: The effective voucher delta record for this item (thus reversable if needed)

device_id.description: The Id of the terminal used. Style differs by Terminal-API-type.

transaction_id.description: The Id assigned by the terminal for this transaction.

card_circuit.description: The detected card circuit as reposrted by the terminal (VISA, MasterCard, GiroCard etc.)

card_pan.description: The cards primary account number. *** on merchant receipts.

receipts.description: The receipt texts reported by the terminal.

raw_response.description: The raw response of the terminal for finalizing the card payment. Might contain additional information.

voucher.description: If a voucher was used for this payment - addtional information will be stored here.

oneOf.description: The effective voucher delta record for this item (thus reversable if needed)

client_id.description: A implementer defined identifier. This can be used for local resource matching and has no business implication. TO BE DEPRECTAED.

source_id.description: The Tillhub or Fleurop Id of the source voucher.

delta_amount.description: The effective change in the value of the voucher.

delta_currency.description: The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.

system.description: Identifier for the voucher system. (Also known as User)

oneOf.description: Title of the source voucher.

type.description: Mainly legacy support for Fleurop flows.

status.description: Client side recorded booking state of the delta operation.

oneOf.description: The Tillhub payment option resource reference ID.
The position of the payment item. E.g. positon 1 (2, 3 etc.) in the transaction.
The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.
The payed amount total.
The included tip amount.

The actual over the counter money flow: regardles what needs to be payed e.g. 49.98, but the customer has given. This is usually of interest in cash payments, or when when customers gave fewer amount than they ought to pay.
The amount that was requested by the POS e.g. 49.98, regardless of what was given e.g. 50.00. Hence the rest is change or tip. This is usually of interest in cash payments.
The cash amount that was handed back from the cashier as change.
The Tillhub branch location ID. If none is specified we will use the one from the transaction.
The Tillhub register location ID. If none is specified we will use the one from the transaction.
Any external reference to a cost center e.g. in enterprise environments.
The applicable Tillhub account e.g for this payment type.
The applicable Tillhub account for the cash payment type used for change.
